website_summaries.verdict: This is a luxurious pore-minimizing primer that will leave your skin looking smooth and silky without being too shiny.
pros: Lightweight, matte formula that reduces the appearance of pores and keep makeup in place
Oil-free formula that contains vitamin E. Many users say it's a staple of their beauty routine and it delivers results quickly
cons: A few users have complained that it feels greasy on their skin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rules. If you have large pores, it makes them practically invisible (caveat: I am Caucasian and can’t speak to how well it may blend on darker skin tones). Thr small tube lasted me a year, wearing makeup probably 4 days/week. It really minimizes the amount of foundation I use and also, I can get by with a much less expensive foundation with this underneath. Washes easily (I can tell bc I can see my pores again, ha). I’ve also used it alone for a bare skin look. A really valuable addition to my admittedly pretty basic and streamlined routine.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Calloway

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have very sensitive skin and I have no problems with the product and no breakouts. Evens out my face and gives a nice matte natural looking tone. Pricey to me for such a small bottle, but I’m 50 and see that make-up is so expensive these days.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I tried this a year ago and was so happy with that I never go without it
customer_reviews.text: I don't go out without this product on my face. I struggle with large pores as my mother did. I exfoliate, wash, mask and peel but still have in my T zone. I tried this a year ago and was so happy with that I never go without it. I was my face, moisturize then wait about 5 minutes for that tp soak in well. Then I apply Porfessional in my T zone and the large pores seem to vanish for the most part. It also helps my foundation to go on smoothly. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Soonerbug

customer_reviews.title: Best pore mimizer I have found
customer_reviews.text: Love this product- it is spendy for the amount you get, but it works very well!
customer_reviews.author: bridget laskey

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pore-minimizer I've ever used so I didn't really know what to expect. It "fills in" my pores as well as could be expected, I guess. One odd thing, though. Every now and then as I'm smoothing the cream across my skin, there will be a black streak in it. Nothing huge, just like what you'd see from an errant speck of mascara or something. The black is not visible in the cream itself, only as you're rubbing it on. It's happened frequently enough that I know it's coming from this product and nothing else. I'm using it on clean skin before applying mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Just a little goes a long way. It makes your face so smooth before putting on your foundation. I use powder foundation and it works great with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a lot cheaper from this vendor, but it is NOT the real thing..I compared this w/ my older tube & this product did not close my pores, was really dark in colour & dried before completely applied. Guess I will spend the $ next time for the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: CeDe

customer_reviews.title: Love it- buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this primer. It covers so well that’s I wear it alone under my powder. Blurs lines and goes on silky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product!
customer_reviews.text: Warning to all who wish to purchase a cheaper product, this is NOT the same product as from Benefit Cosmetics. It's as if someone filled the bottle with a thick and pasty foundation. Do NOT purchase this if you wish to just save some money. I figured it was too good to be true!
customer_reviews.author: Tara A Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive, but good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that is WAY over priced! I understand you get what you pay for, and that this us a high end product. But they would probably make more money if they lowered the price a little. It’s ridiculously high.
customer_reviews.author: Gera Clemenson

customer_reviews.title: pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff. I put it on my cheeks and nose (where the pores are biggest) and it really does make them disappear! I think it will last a really long time because of how little you need :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: Made my makeup look thick, did not conceal
customer_reviews.text: This pore concealer did not help cover my pore, just made my makeup look extra thick.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: Knock off, no red stamp on front. Not as good.
customer_reviews.author: *L*

customer_reviews.title: Phony, Counterfeit, Imitation,  Fake, NOT the real kind!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond a shadow of a doubt, double checked with manufacture of authentic brand, this turned out to be a FAKE, CHEAP, IMITATION. This was purchased as a Christmas gift and was a huge disappointment. This product's formula and ingredients could allegedly be hazardous, I have also come to find out. Seller offered a full refund, however, I did not want seller to resell this to some unsuspecting person. I also do not feel that I should have to take MY time to package item and take to the post office. I would not recommend purchasing anyting like this from seller or anyone else online except a reputable makeup company.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gumby

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go without it
customer_reviews.text: I am not a makeup wearer aside from mascara. Though I know I should wear cover-up on sun-spotted areas, everything felt so heavy. I received a sample of the POREfessional and tried it - OMG! It's light. It's smooth. And it does not suffocate my skin in any way. Additionally, even though I did not think there was a major change in the look of my skin, many, many people commented on how my skin looked so healthy lately. It also prevents shine without any drying. This stuff does it all. I am forever grateful and a believer in this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: staci quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Different than I have recieved before..
customer_reviews.text: Maybe they have made some changes to the product. But the tube is exactly the same, word for word, and this product seems to be lighter in color, thinner and leaves a shine rather than being dull and blending. It isn't bad, just different. I don't like the shine, but it does seem to take less of this... Still love it, but wondering if they changed the product.
customer_reviews.author: Davey Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Fills in the pores and takes away the shine moves ...
customer_reviews.text: Fills in the pores and takes away the shine moves the skin out for a more youthful look my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product will buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product will buy again and again. Very light weight and little goes along way, it lasted me for a year but it's probably because I only ware make up occasionally. Even without wearing foundation it did a fantastic job at coving my pores. I now understand why this product had some many stars and good ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing- I've never felt my skin so ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing- I've never felt my skin so smooth. It immediately smooths out my face and I can barely see the pores anymore. Unfortunately, you do pay for the quality with the high price, but if you have the money then go for it. If I ever become rich and famous this will be on my shopping list for sure.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It goes on smooth and makes me feel more confident about my imperfections. The only drawback is I think it truly does make you get sweatier if you're prone to that. So test it out first because that's not necessarily sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE BENEFIT COSMETIC
customer_reviews.text: I received this product, the tube was completely busted opened. I have bought Benefit products for years, I do not believe this is a true product! It is greasy and pink in color unlike the true Porefection from Benefit cosmetics. On top of the bad rating I am submitting, I also received a coupon for (If you like this product I will send you a 100$ gift certificate) TOTALL GIMMICK.
customer_reviews.author: nichole evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have used it for a couple years now! It does a great job of concealing my pores and it doesn’t dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: This is not real porefessional
customer_reviews.text: it was not the true product. I tried to save some money by buying my porrfessional for a long time. this is not the true product and I would know I've been using it for a long time. it works okay but not as good as the true stuff it's some other kind of makeup in a porefessional box
customer_reviews.author: Looking out for ya

customer_reviews.title: Ive used this for a long time and it does ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this for a long time and it does hide pores. I do wish it were a little closer to the color of my complexion,
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rose

customer_reviews.title: Boo - returning :(
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad . . . I want to love this, but it just didn't work for me. It works at first, works great! BUT like an hour later - I am super shiny and my pores are back to regular. It says to take it w/ you . . . but honestly, I am not looking for a product I have to reapply during the day. I'd have to dab it, powder myself again - really, just re-do my whole face!!! I am a benefit LOVER so while this product is not for my skin, I am so happy with the company and other products. I also love that I can buy it on Amazon w/ FREE shipping.
customer_reviews.author: GlitterjenTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Great product...PF
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for reducing the size of pores. Its goes on very smooth and I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA Fabbri

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all of the time. I am an older lady and have trouble with pores. However, this product works exactly as described and I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: pam k

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you're acne-prone
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this primer... And at first I did. The consistency is nice and it goes on really smoothly. It actually did a good job camouflaging my pores and extending the wear of my makeup. Unfortunately, it also clogged my pores and broke me out pretty badly each time I tried to use it. I'm acne-prone and obviously I was sensitive to one of the ingredients. If you have acne, see if you can try it out at a make-up store before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps hide those nasty wrinkles above the top lip as well as nose pores.
customer_reviews.author: vanness14

customer_reviews.title: Rather than a smoothing silky pore minimizer (I have used this for years but never ordered it through Amazon) it was like a heav
customer_reviews.text: This item was not the regular Benefit porefessional. Rather than a smoothing silky pore minimizer (I have used this for years but never ordered it through Amazon) it was like a heavy foundation that actually settles into pores making them more visible... 😯
customer_reviews.author: Carianne

customer_reviews.title: Just okay?
customer_reviews.text: I used this product hoping that each time I would see some kind of difference. However, after 10 applications...nothing. It feels good when you put it on, but...nothing. Sorry for such just an "okay" rating.
customer_reviews.author: JJG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff!!! My face feels do soft and smooth. I have mefium to large size pores and it fills them all in. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Amezcua

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did not work it’s very thin does not cover well at all
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Love this primer
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this primer from the consistency to the even skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dix

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best pore minimizer! I have huge pores and never wear foundation. This is as light as a cloud and works!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Riley ❤

customer_reviews.title: The most AMAZING pore filler / primer I have ever used-more so ...
customer_reviews.text: The most AMAZING pore filler / primer I have ever used-more so than any other product used regardless of price. Buy it and you will be hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Too much hype for something not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I'm just not using this correctly? because all the hype about it confuses me alot. I was eager to try this out and when I finally got it, I didn't get nearly the results I wanted. It mostly leaves my nose flake-y when I put it on. If I put too little then you can't see a difference. Don't waste your money on this when a little foundation could do a much better job at filling/covering pores and for the same amount of time prettty much.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: dont buy from this company!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product directly from the store so I know what it should feel like. This was not the real thing!!! Beware if buying from this site. Save your money and buy it directly from ULTA or Macy's.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer. It really fills in fine lines and smooths over skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse89

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: My skin looks so different, for the better, with this product. So glad I found this and will always keep using it as part of my makeup regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Kuehn

customer_reviews.title: Just POREfect!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Just a little dab on my (yes, I will admit it) GIANT pores and they are history - visually anyway. They are still there, this product does not help to reduce the size or anything, but only I know it. It seems a bit pricey, but you really don't need a whole lot to get the job done. And somehow it is tinted just right to blend perfectly, it doesn't stick out like a mismatched foundation or anything. So you can skip the foundation if you want and just powder up or go without anything. Great, great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. When I applied my foundation about 30 minutes after putting Porefessional on it was a mess. The porefessional got clumpy with the makeup and I had to wash everything off and start over. I had better luck with less expensive drugstore varieties!
customer_reviews.author: Keri deRoziere

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent Product
customer_reviews.text: I got a fraudulent product! This is NOT the same stuff that I've gotten at retail stores. I guess I should've know the price was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Hudson

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy from here, this isn't the real Benefit Porefessional product by Benefit Cosmetics. It has the same packaging, but is tampered with, the tube wasn't even sealed and it definitely does not look like the Porefessional by Benefit I have been using. Absolutely ridiculous that Amazon would allow this to happen...I am returning it. It's better to just spend the money and go buy it from Benefit or a cosmetics store so you know you're getting the real thing. What a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Teen

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy benefit buyer
customer_reviews.text: The size of the tube was a lot smaller then the 1 I had! Also the price was almost the same as if I bought it retail myself! I purchased it in the store!
customer_reviews.author: AIL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product that makes makeup look awesome.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. Would never be without it. Makes my makeup look so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Reed

customer_reviews.title: It's supposed to be a SERUM - what is in my tube is like lotion. So
customer_reviews.text: This is FAKE. It's supposed to be a SERUM - what is in my tube is like lotion. So groas
customer_reviews.author: SSumers33

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far this is a 10. I wish I heard of it a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Garrison Jones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: What I received was a knock-off of the real Benefit Porefessional product.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie K. McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on so smooth and light, looks natural on a fair skinned person like me! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyedOne

customer_reviews.title: Very good seller :)
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the product because of the negative review. So I contact the seller before I purchase the seller promised to refund if anything. I've been using this product for some times. It feels the same as the other ones I used before. Thank you , I will purchase from this seller again !
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product that I have tried for reducing the visibility ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product that I have tried for reducing the visibility of pores. It works well under liquid or powder makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ekstrom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but it runs out super fast.
customer_reviews.author: rapera@goldmail.etsu.edu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loves this stuff leaves her skin feeling soft and does reduce the appearance of her pores.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing.
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to be either a counterfeit or it was expired. It was not at all the texture that Benefit Porefessional is supposed to be. I feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Leaks

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed in this product for all the great reviews it gets. It came to me dusty, so the container must have been sitting around for awhile. Also, it is really expensive for what you get and you have to reapply. Monistat Chafing relief powder gel is much better and stays on and is only $8.99 at your drug store or on Amazon. Give that a try instead!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anuzelli

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS STUFF! It's awesome and makes my face look totally smooth. (I look like a giant crater without makeup) It totally works and I recommend to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie from TX

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS SUPER FAKE. THE BOTTLE WAS OPEN AND THE PRODUCT WAS NOT THE SAME AS THE REAL ONE, SUPER GREASY AND STICKY. I JUST WANT TO RETURN IT AND GET MY MONEY BACK!
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Like magic! Skin looks super smooth and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Makes skin look flawless. Can't recommend BENEFIT products enough, especially this one! Quality, quality, quality. One tip: invest in a gentle scrub cleanser and toner for a once a week deep cleaning. (This is basically spackle for your pores---but looks awesome and has caused me no skin reaction, even though my skin is very sensitive.) A bit pricey, but well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I`ve use Porefessional for a long time. Tried other products but this one is the best. I would highly recommed it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Loguidice

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bigger size was not the same consistency as the trail size I had previously used.
customer_reviews.author: aimee wilson

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!!! FAKE!!!! FAKE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! This is FAKE! I've been buying the real product from Sephora for over 3 years and I love it. This thing is like a cheap foundation, smells weird and is not even the same color. To top it off on the back instead of saying OIL FREE IT SAYS OIL TREE!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I don't know what I would do without this stuff! Its just amazing, just like magic! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Woooooooooow this product is so so amazing I really liked it so much. It helped me keeping the foundation smooth and poreless
customer_reviews.author: Nasser

customer_reviews.title: The best primer
customer_reviews.text: The best primer to minimize pores! Very soft/smooth and perfect for anytime/any kind makeup. But a little bit small for the price...
customer_reviews.author: Cristiane Harumi Miura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It lasts for a few months and never makes me break out!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Langford

customer_reviews.title: Really POREfessional
customer_reviews.text: This product really reduces my pores - and it also keeps my oily face matte so much longer than just a moisturiser or a primer. It makes my t-zone smooth so it's really easy to apply foundation over it.
customer_reviews.author: Elin Handeland

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: A must have staple to your makeup collection. Lightweight and non greasy and offers great coverage. Visibly reduces pores and fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: It is great!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it won't completely hide all my pores, it minimizes my pores really well! I recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: So, I was kind of skeptical of this product when I bought it because hey, what product can *actually* make your face look flawless with it being applied by a professional? And then, I tried this. And WOW does it work--just be sure to dab instead of schmear it on, and your face will look flawless! it even covered up some of my trouble spots (amazing). It almost made my face look airbrushed! wow!
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: BEST primer ever
customer_reviews.text: The BEST primer ever! Very thin and definitely work like magic...I LOVE IT! I am going to purchase more...Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Ryan_Siv

customer_reviews.title: benefit is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product for years and I don't know what I would do without. My fine line and dark circles literally disappear!!! Love, Love, Love benefit porefessional!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimstriss

customer_reviews.title: Pores are GONE!
customer_reviews.text: The POREfessional is wonderful... it goes on nicely, does the job it's supposed to do, and makes my makeup go on so much smoother than most!
customer_reviews.author: Aprilkevinlexie

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! Great coverage with such a small amount! The duration of the product is definitely worth the money! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for smoothing the look of pores. It is smooth and easy to apply and feels comfortable, a little like a very fine powder.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gray

customer_reviews.title: pores almost go away
customer_reviews.text: I bought POREprofessional because I read so many glowing reviews. It acts like a primer but would be too expensive to use it as such.It works on the pores on my chin but not on the top and sides of my nose. I've tried using 2 coats but it doesn't make any difference. since this is the first pore product I've bought, I didn't have anything to compare it with. I will do some more research to find a better product- one that would be 4 stars or above. I probably would not recommend POREfessional Translucent.
customer_reviews.author: butterfly smith

customer_reviews.title: Who needs make makeup? This smooths Your skin, covers pores, it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Smooths my face, smooths out small wrinkles, many times that's all I need no more foundations
customer_reviews.author: Coleen Charbonneau

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and short-lasting
customer_reviews.text: This product is way too expensive. I thought it was worth the money; however, when I tried the product, it is very short-lasting. I think it lasts for only about an hour when I have tried on for couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excelente
customer_reviews.text: Estava muito curiosa sobre este produto usado por maquiadores e a sensação da Benefit. Estou muito satisfeita com a compra!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Seller Review- Not the real product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product from the seller, Beauty Brands 4 U. WARNING- THIS IS NOT THE REAL THING!! I've purchased this item directly from Benefit Cosmetics before so I can absolutely tell the difference. First of all, the tube arrived unsealed and appeared as though it was just filled with regular foundation. The color and texture is completely different from the actual Benefit product. Very disappointed. Do not order from this seller just to save a few bucks. Order the real thing from a reliable source.
customer_reviews.author: KLG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt last all day, but this product really helps my skin look so smooth. At least temporarily, which I really appreciate. Thanks for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: jscorvallis

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and didn't realize it was a primer. I have good skin so I gave it away as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby21

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Fake product, they took the packaging and filled it with something else
customer_reviews.author: Natalie P. Shyu

customer_reviews.title: This is not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several Benefit POREfessional tubes directly from Benefit Cosmetics. That stuff is awesome, not tinted, not greasy, not at all like the stuff that Outlet de Beaute is selling. Worse, Outlet de Beaute has had several complaints about this from different people regarding different Benefit products and they're still selling the stuff. I wrote a review of them stating that I knew the product was fake, and, instead of owning that fact, they just said that the packaging was different because it was from "Europe or Asia." Obviously, I shouldn't have been taken in by the cheap pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily/combo, sensitive skin and this primer is amaaaaazing. It does not cause breakouts and keeps me looking matte all day. I only have to blot maybe once at the end of the work day. It has a very smooth silky texture, pleasant light scent, and a little goes a long way. I have tried a lot of primers (Laura Mercier, Too Faced, Makeup For Ever, smashbox etc.) and this one is my favorite.Will definitely continue to buy this product and highly recommend it to anyone that has oily skin like mine.
customer_reviews.author: shawna

customer_reviews.title: Lower price than in stores! Same great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than at the store. Same great quality. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed!
customer_reviews.text: This product barely makes my pores look smaller AND accentuates my wrinkles! A waste of money. SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jana lee corn

customer_reviews.title: Great mattifying primer
customer_reviews.text: Effective blurring primer. It has a mattifying effect as well. This is my everyday primer I use before makeup. When my pores feel more enlarged, this definitely helps to blur the pore size
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product
customer_reviews.text: I was sold a knock off product so I am not able to comment on the actual product. When I tried to return it the tube was mysteriously "empty" so I was not able to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Pore Minimizer
customer_reviews.text: I love Benefit Cosmetics mainly because they deliver a great product at a reasonable price. I docked one star because this is way too pricey for what you get, IMO. It's a good pore minimizer that leaves your skin a perfect canvas for foundation. If your skin is in good shape, you can wear it alone too. I've purchased from Amazon, also locally from Ulta, and a department store Kiosk. It's the same product. Less is more with this product, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Aalea1

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, but you cannot trust vendor Califee
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item all the time directly from Benefit, and it is wonderful, so I know that the product I received from vendor CALIFEE is an imposter. It is supposed to be TRANSLUCENT and SILKY. This was a thick pinkish color, VERY FRAGRANT (very different fragrance from the real stuff) and STICKY. On top of that, the protective seal was not attached to the top and it was very sticky because it appears that adhesive was added to it in attempt to reseal the top of the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Maria D

customer_reviews.title: Not Real
customer_reviews.text: This is not real as I'm sure you've read in the comments. FYI I received a note saying "give this a positive review my wife has cancer" Guilt trip much? Maybe you'd get a good review if it was actually the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesee

customer_reviews.title: This is the best out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best out there. Have tried several products and this one worked excellent in cosing pores and looking soft
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: speedy shipping
customer_reviews.text: just like going to ulta but without having to leave my desk!
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Goodsell-Fossett

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Its not awful, but I like smashbox photo finish much better. This product didn't glide on very well and the overall finish was just okay. Even with the tint it has, it didn't help my skin very much. On days that I don't use the smashbox product, I use aveeno tinted moisturizer and that works better than this product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Eastman

customer_reviews.title: good to have it
customer_reviews.text: The lotion is arguably some of the best I've used. I love the the intricacy of its ingredients that complement the ultimate quality when I used it. Would highly recommend to anyone who cares about his or her skin. In addition, the perfect size adds to a good traveling accessory
customer_reviews.author: Rainn Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Yep, Benefit products rock!
customer_reviews.text: Benefit makes quality products, this one is no exception! I apply once in the morning daily with my foundation and never have to touch up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana S

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: It simply was no better then products at half the price
customer_reviews.author: Paula Teats

customer_reviews.title: Best item in my makeup bag. Use primer after sunscreen and look flawless
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful coverage for primer. Using a primer smooths over imperfections, fine lines and enlarged pores. Always clean skin and apply sunscreen first- then apply Benefit primer, powder or liquid foundation go over smoothly. Clean feel on skin and it does not clog pores.
customer_reviews.author: Avinlea

customer_reviews.title: It works better than anything I have used
customer_reviews.text: It works better than anything I have used. I'm 62 and the older you get the larger your pores get. Doesn't cover completely but pretty well. Worth the price because it last forever. When you have squeezed all you can out cut it in half. You will be amazed at how much is left.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lee

product_meta.title: Benefit Cosmetics the POREfessional Pore Minimizing Face Primer 0.75 Ounce
product_meta.description: Quickly minimize the appearance of pores & fine lines for smoother-than-smooth skin! Apply this silky, lightweight balm alone, under or over makeup. The translucent formula contains a vitamin E derivative known to protect skin from free-radicals.
feature_bullets: Quickly minimize the appearance of pores and fine lines for smoother-than-smooth skin.
Apply this silky, lightweight balm alone, under or over makeup.
The translucent formula contains a vitamin E derivative known to protect skin.
